meanings.definition: To communicate or work together with someone or something
meanings.sent1: The children interacted happily during playtime.
meanings.sent2: The team members interacted well to complete the project.
meanings.sent3: The robots interacted in a funny dance routine.
meanings.sent4: The colors on the painting interacted to create a beautiful harmony.
meanings.sent5: The characters in the story interacted vividly, bringing the plot to life.

meanings.definition: To have an effect on each other
meanings.sent1: The medicine interacted with her body to relieve the pain.
meanings.sent2: The different chemicals interacted to produce a surprising reaction.
meanings.sent3: The cat and dog interacted in a way that made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The music and lyrics interacted to evoke strong emotions in the audience.
meanings.sent5: The weather elements interacted dramatically, causing a sudden storm.
